metadata.title: CVE-2022-2230 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Stored Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in the project settings page inGitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 14.4 prior to 14.10.5, 15.0 priorto 15.0.4, and 15.1 prior to 15.1.1, allows an attacker to executearbitrary JavaScript code in GitLab on a victim's behalf.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
